description: A bundle of wadding, black gunpowder, a tightly-packed explosive shell with a percussion fuse, and a mininuke.  A non-Civil War era "mininuke shell" for cannons of 3-inch bore, whatever it hits probably won't live to regret it.  Especially when they are showered with radiation.
//2: Base damage of 544, rounded down to 450 to be close to 25% that of round shot, balanced as FMJ.

description: A bundle of wadding, black gunpowder, and a tightly-packed explosive shell with a percussion fuse.  A Civil War era "explosive shell" for cannons of 3-inch bore, whatever it hits probably won't live to regret it.  Leaves an active bomb at the target, which explodes later.
//2: Base damage of 544, rounded down to 450 to be close to 25% that of round shot, balanced as FMJ.

description: A bundle of wadding, black gunpowder, and a bundle of rock-sized iron balls.  A Civil War era "grapeshot shell" for cannons of 3-inch bore, whatever it hits probably won't live to regret it.
A bundle of wadding, black gunpowder, and some powder to set things on fire.  A Civil War era "common shell" for cannons of 3-inch bore, whatever it hits will stay warm for the rest of it's life.
A beanbag the size of a baseball.  Makes a lame melee weapon, but is good for throwing at enemies.
A throwable molotov.  A bottle of flammable liquid with a rag inserted.  Since it is made specially, it activates instantly when hit.
A bag of pebbles, which is the size of a baseball.  Not good as an actual shotgun, but is good for shooting at multiple enemies.
A grenade modified with some steel scraps, which makes you to throw this (using a staff sling) at a longer range.
An improvised grenade modified with some steel scraps, which makes you to throw this (using a staff sling) at a longer range.

An cola bomb modified with some steel scraps, which makes you to throw this (using a staff sling) at a longer range.
A frag cola bomb modified with some steel scraps, which makes you to throw this (using a staff sling) at a longer range.
An improvised anti-tank grenade modified with some steel scraps, which makes you to throw this (using a staff sling) at a longer range.
An improvised high explosive grenade modified with some steel scraps, which makes you to throw this (using a staff sling) at a longer range.

name.str: shootable improvised pipe bomb, long fuse

description: A long fuse improvised pipe bomb modified with some steel scraps, which makes you to throw this (using a staff sling) at a longer range.
An undead signal bomb modified with some steel scraps, which makes you to throw this (using a staff sling) at a longer range.
A corrosive gas grenade modified with some steel scraps, which makes you to throw this (using a staff sling) at a longer range.
A concertina bomb modified with some steel scraps, which makes you to throw this (using a staff sling) at a longer range.
A flash bomb modified with some steel scraps, which makes you to throw this (using a staff sling) at a longer range.
A ninja bomb modified with some steel scraps, which makes you to throw this (using a staff sling) at a longer range.
A tube of small paintballs.  They deal virtually no damage, but they do burst on impact.
A tube of small paintballs.  They deal virtually no damage, but can hit multiple targets.
A tube of small paintballs.  They deal virtually no damage, but they will blow up if it hits.  It is almost a ball filled with gunpowder.
A tube of small paintballs.  They deal virtually no damage, but they will stun you.  It is almost a ball of hard rubber.
A tube of small paintballs.  They deal virtually no damage, but they do glow in the dark when they are shot from a gun.
This is an active glowing paintball and is producing light.  It will last for a few minutes before burning out.
A tube of small paintballs.  They deal virtually no damage, but they will let some tear gas.
A plastic disc based on an actual CD, it is smaller than a normal disc.
Powered by your voice, a handful of scraps is some type of ammo now.  Although it is loud, it does not deal a lot of damage.
Powered by your voice, a handful of scraps is some type of ammo now.  Although it is loud, it does deal a bit of damage.
A bundle of paper, which is useable as an ammo for jokes.  It has long range but almost no damage.
A bundle of cards, which is useable as an ammo for jokes.  It has short range but have some damage.
A shell filled with coins.  Extremely damaging, but does not penetrate any armor.
A heavy and sharp metal slug used with shotguns to give them the range capabilities of a rifle.  Not that damaging, but pretty accurate.
A incendiary round for shotguns, very deadly.  Unlike the shot version, this one shoots a line of flame like a flamethrower.
Shoots a line of toxic gas, and it gives a bit of a smokescreen.  MY TOXIC BABES ARE IN POSITION!
Shoots a line of anti-fungi gas, and it gives a bit of a smokescreen.
Shoots a line of pest-killer gas, and it gives a bit of a smokescreen.
An acid round for shotguns, which leaves a puddle of corrosive acid.
A lightning round for shotguns, which can shock a bunch of enemies.
An instant EMP for shotguns, useful against machines.
An instant flashbang round for shotguns, good for blinding others.
A shotshell designed to provide teargas.
A shotshell designed to provide smoke cover.
A shotshell designed to shoot flares.
A shotshell designed to shoot scrambler grenades.
Two pieces of heavy metal slug, tied with steel wires used with shotguns to give them the range capabilities of a rifle.  Not that damaging, but tangles enemies.
A slug-like pack, includes sticky web shot with shotguns to give them the range capabilities of a rifle.  Not that damaging, but tangles and webs enemies.
Some powder for extinguishing fire.
Some pellets for pop guns.
Some pellets for pop guns.
Water enhanced with chemicals to create sprayable electric shock ammo for the chemical thrower.  Best be used with some kind of mask or mouth protection.
Water enhanced with chemicals to create sprayable smoke ammo for the chemical thrower.  Best be used with some kind of mask or mouth protection.
Water enhanced with chemicals to create sprayable teargas ammo for the chemical thrower.  Best be used with some kind of mask or mouth protection.
Water enhanced with acid to create sprayable corrosive ammo for the chemical thrower.  Best be used with some kind of mask or mouth protection.
Water enhanced with chemicals to create sprayable, flammable flash powder ammo for the chemical thrower.  Best be used with some kind of mask or mouth protection.
A box of small plastic balls.  They deal virtually no damage.
A tiny bb-sized ammo, which kinda acts like a flamethrower when shot.  The short range makes it a useless weapon, but could blind some when hit.
A tiny steel nail with some chemical on it.  Can be fired from a nail gun or similar weapon.
A tiny steel nail with some poison on it.  Can be fired from a nail gun or similar weapon.
A tiny superalloy dart.  Can be fired from a nail gun or similar weapon.  Hard to make but very damaging.
A big ball bearing, useful as ammunition for slings.
Water mixed with paint.  It won't be good for your health, so do not drink it.

name: poison mix
description: Improvised, unknown mix of poison.  It tastes horrible and dangerous too!

name: goo mix
description: Improvised, unknown mix of goo.  It tastes horrible and dangerous too!

name: thicker goo mix
description: Improvised, unknown, and thicker mix of goo.  It tastes horrible and dangerous too!
An underwater fishing spear made from wood tipped with explosives.  It's very light, but doesn't have much range.  Stands almost no chance of remaining intact once fired.
A modified rocket candy, useful as ammunition for slings or slingshots.  When shot, it drops an active rocket candy.
A modified firecracker, useful as ammunition for slings or slingshots.  When shot, it drops an active firecracker.
A handful of round projectiles covered in poison, useful for slings or slingshots.
A handful of round projectiles covered in triffid juice, useful for slings or slingshots.
A handful of round projectiles made of rubber, useful for slings or slingshots.
An extremely modified fishing spear, when is shot, will explode the target in a ball of fire.
Some pellets for melta guns.
Some ink.  This can be reloaded into fountain pens.  Or could be used as an ammo for blinding others.
A low velocity 40mm fungicidal gas canister.  It is effective for fungal life forms.
